constitutionalsection.para: All officers of government shall give bond as may be prescribed by law.

source.para: Transferred by Constitutional Convention, 1919-1920, art. IV, sec. 26;

annotation.para: Bond required of public officers by Constitution may be defined as a contractual obligation that such officer will faithfully discharge the duties of his office. Laverty v. Cochran, 132 Neb. 118, 271 N.W. 354 (1936).
